languages.text: Fires 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
languages.original_text: Выпускает 4 залпа торпед с акустическими боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} при {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}прямом попадании{/g} и 12 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.

traits.locale_text: Fires 4 torpedo salvo with sonic warheads. Each Torpedo deals 30 Damage by a Direct Hit and 20 Damage within a 1-cell area when misses and is detonatated by a proximity fuse.

Fires 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.

Fires 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Fires{/g} 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a direct hit and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}proximity fuse{/g}.

languages.text: Выпускает 4 залпа торпед с акустическими боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}урона{/g} при {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}прямом попадании{/g} и 12 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.

traits.locale_text: Выпускает 4 залпа торпед с акустическими боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 30 урона при прямом попадании и 20 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.
Выпускает 4 залпа торпед с акустическими боеголовками. Каждая торпеда наносит 30 урона при прямом попадании и 20 урона в радиусе 1 клетки при промахе и детонации от неконтактного взрывателя.

languages.text: Feuert 4 Torpedosalven mit Schallgefechtsköpfen ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direkten Treffer{/g} 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Fehlschüsse verursachen in einem Radius von 1 Feld 12 Schaden, da sie mittels Annäherungszünder explodieren.
languages.original_text: Fires 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Feuert{/g} 4 Torpedosalven mit Schallgefechtsköpfen ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht 30 Schaden bei einem direkten {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Treffer{/g} und 20 Schaden in einem 1-Feld-Bereich beim Verfehlen und detoniert mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g}.

Feuert 4 Torpedosalven mit Schallgefechtsköpfen ab. Jeder Torpedo verursacht mit einem direkten Treffer 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}. Fehlschüsse verursachen in einem Radius von 1 Feld 12 Schaden, da sie mittels {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g} explodieren.

languages.text: Tire 4 salves de torpilles équipées d'ogives soniques. Chaque torpille inflige 22 points de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} en cas d'{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}impact direct{/g} et 12 points de dégâts dans une zone d'une case en cas de tir manqué et d'explosion déclenchée par une fusée de proximité.
languages.original_text: Fires 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}Tire{/g} 4 salves de torpilles avec des ogives à plasma. Chaque torpille inflige 30 points de dégâts en cas de {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}coup{/g} direct et 20 points de dégâts dans une zone d'une case en cas de tir manqué, et explose sur une {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}fusée de proximité{/g}.

languages.text: 发射4枚配备音波弹头的鱼雷。每枚鱼雷{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直接命中{/g}目标时会造成22点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。如果未能命中目标，则会引爆近炸引信，在1格范围内造成12点伤害。
languages.original_text: Fires 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}发射{/g}4枚配备音波弹头的鱼雷。每枚鱼雷直接{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}目标时会造成30点伤害。如果未能命中目标，则会引爆{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近炸引信{/g}，在1格范围内造成20点伤害。
发射4枚配备音波弹头的鱼雷。每枚鱼雷直接命中目标时会造成22点{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。如果未能命中目标，则会引爆{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近炸引信{/g}，在1格范围内造成12点伤害。

languages.text: Dispara salvas de 4 torpedos con ojivas sónicas. Cada torpedo inflige 22 de {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}daño{/g} si consigue un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}impacto directo{/g} y 12 de daño en un radio de 1 casilla si falla, usando un detonador de proximidad.
languages.original_text: Fires 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.

traits.locale_text: Dispara salvas de 4 torpedos con ojivas sónicas.{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}{/g} Cada torpedo inflige 30 de daño si consigue un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}impacto{/g} directo y 20 de daño en un radio de 1 casilla si falla, usando un {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}detonador de proximidad{/g}.

languages.text: ソニック弾頭を搭載した魚雷を4発発射する。攻撃時、魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直撃{/g}で22{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、ミスした場合は近接信管で1セル以内に12ダメージを与える。
languages.original_text: Fires 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.

traits.locale_text: ソニック弾頭を搭載した魚雷を4発発射する。攻撃時、魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直撃{/g}で22{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、ミスした場合は{g|Encyclopedia:ProximityFuseSpace}近接信管{/g}で1セル以内に12ダメージを与える。
ソニック弾頭を搭載した魚雷を4発発射する。攻撃時、魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}で爆発し、直撃時に22{g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}、ミスした場合は1セル以内に12ダメージを与える。

languages.text: Sonik savaş başlıklarıyla donatılmış 4 torpido salvosu ateşler. Her bir torpido, {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}doğrudan vuruşta{/g} 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}hasar{/g}; ıskalayıp da yakınlık fünyesi ile patlatıldığı takdirde ise 1 hücrelik alanda 12 hasar verir.
languages.original_text: Fires 4 torpedo salvos with sonic warheads. Each torpedo deals 22 {g|Encyclopedia:SpaceBattleDamageGlossary}damage{/g} on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} and 12 damage within a 1-cell area on a miss, detonating on a proximity fuse.
